description: Fleet-dev hooks for Windows/Git Bash compatibility and skill enforcement

hooks.prompt: Check if this Bash command contains 'gh' and 'issue'. If YES: Return permissionDecision 'ask' with reason reminding to use the appropriate Fleet skill instead of direct gh commands. For claude-research repo: remind about /fleet-dev:research skill. For other repos: remind about /fleet-core:feedback skill. If NO 'gh' and 'issue' in command: Return permissionDecision 'allow' without comment.
